english.segment1: Hold me somebody. Don't let me be alone. Love me, stay with me. I am dying to be known. My heart cries out
english.segment2: I need a Father. Whose love will never fail me. A friend like no other. Whose trusted arms will hold me. I need a Father
english.segment3: I am wounded. But I tuck the pain away. Free me, heal me. I don't want to be afraid. My heart cries out
english.segment4: Here's my heart. Be tender, please. Let me know Your love for me. Here's my heart. Im on my knees. I will trust. Cause I believe
english.segment5: You are my Father. Your love will never fail me. A friend like no other. Your trusted arms will hold me. You are my Father
